headline: NRG Energy, GE Vernova and Kiewit Accelerating New Generation Capacity to Support Demand Growth
summary: HOUSTON, February 26, 2025--NRG Energy Inc. (NYSE:NRG) today joined GE Vernova, Inc. (NYSE: GEV) and TIC – The Industrial Company (TIC), a subsidiary of Kiewit Corporation (Kiewit) in announcing a new venture aimed at rapidly bringing new electricity generation capacity to market in response to growing demand for computing power and generative AI (GenAI).

raw.headline: NRG Energy, GE Vernova and Kiewit Accelerating New Generation Capacity to Support Demand Growth
